DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the optimal protocol for dexmedetomidine used in children during perioperative period.
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Research of Intranasal Dexmedetomidine Used in Plastic Surgery of Children
DOC.criteria: Written informed consent. Elective cleft lip and cleft palate repair surgery American Society of Anesthesiologists class I Aged between 6 months and 7 years old Suspected or confirmed difficult airway History of upper respiratory tract infection with 1 month Combined with congenital heart disease Allergic to investigational products or with other contraindication Growth retardation or dysgnosia Central nervous system disease Serious infection Serious heart,brain,liver,kidney, pulmonary, and endocrine disease
DOC.keyword: The efficacy and safety of intranasal dexmedetomidine
